name: Saberbeast
description:
THEY HEAR EVERYTHING! BE MINDFUL OF YOUR ACTIONS!
Saberbeast is a first person horror game designed to test your awareness and provoke fear. 
I took this project solo and set myself a goal to have this done in under 30 days. I am pleased with what I was able to produce so I hope you guys like it.

I've decided to run another competition for whoever gets the best brutal mode time score. The deadline will get decided soon.  For more information, join my discord server or read the competition tab in the main menu.

Donations will go towards the prize pool.
I'd like to thank my discord server for assisting me in making this game as best as it could be. 

Please leave feedback I would love to hear what you think!

Join my discord to hear all the latest news about the game and other things. https://discord.gg/QJQwCMX
